title: was this trolll or dumbest ip boosts i`ve ever seen ?0% IP BOOSTS
body:
0% 2 man 3 man 4 man 5 man 

ALL 0 %

EVEN AFTER GAME 112 IP NOT GAINED ,200 IP FIRST WIN WITH 5 MAN ,104 IP NOT GAINED

DUMBEST IP BOOST ON EUNE ,NOW ITS OVER STILL 0 IP GAINED FOR PREMADES.

replies.body: This is a visual issue on the legacy client, but there is indeed a bonus IP event currently.  Per the [start of season 7](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/competitive/2017-ranked-season-kicks), players in ranked flex received a boost.  Hope that helps clear things up!
